properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 13 at 3:02PM AKST until February 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills as cold as 55 below zero.

* WHERE...Deltana and Tanana Flats.

* WHEN...6 AM Friday to noon Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO NOON AKST SATURDAY
